message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000.  It's a fair price considering its value. I'm confident it will be a great investment for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,200,000 is too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,500,000. This is a fair price that recognizes the value of the product and leaves room for both of us to benefit from this deal.
I understand that $1,500,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $1,350,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product to me.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1,350,000 is still a bit low. I'm willing to come down to $1,450,000. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and allows us both to get a good deal.  Let's make this happen!

I understand that $1,450,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and pay $1,400,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product to me.
